Title: Requires electric vehicle charging stations to be installed at certain gasoline stations
Summary: Requires electric vehicle charging stations to be installed at gasoline stations when new gas dispensing motor fuel pumps are being installed at such gasoline station; prohibits building permits from being issued when there is not at least one electric vehicle charging station being installed at such gas station.
LawCode: Add ยง396-xx, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring electric vehicle charging stations to be installed at certain gasoline stations
